40 Photos That Prove Timing Is Everything

Brian
Art, Photography
ADVERTISEMENT

At the intersection of magic and timing, photography rules. If these photos were taken a second sooner or later, the effect would be gone. Thankfully, they were perfect.

1. Yawning soldier

Kickvick

There’s always that one defiant guy who lives his life by the lyrics of David Bowie’s “Rebel, Rebel.” And who can blame him? The life of a soldier is so regimented otherwise. Why do people yawn? Reasons include being hungry, bored, or fatigued. Studies show that Olympic athletes will occasionally yawn before a big event and musicians might yawn before taking the stage.
